subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Franz Beckenbauer, who won World Cups with Germany as a player and coach, was suspended for refusing to cooperate with an investigation over bidding for the 2018 and 2022 tournaments.
snippet: Franz Beckenbauer, who won World Cups with Germany as a player and coach, was suspended for refusing to cooperate with an investigation over bidding for the 2018 and 2022 tournaments.
